summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility and litter control; amending Chapter 21.36 (Solid Waste Management) and Chapter 21.40 (Solid Waste Collection Routes and Charges) of the Seattle Municipal Code to add administrative provisions, to clarify the management of solid waste, to create a Litter Control Code, to recodify provisions, to define violations, and to revise penalties and add penalties for littering and illegal dumping of solid waste.
